newsitem.title: HONG KONG: Land Bank of the Philippines sets US$200 mln FRCD.
newsitem.headline: Land Bank of the Philippines sets US$200 mln FRCD.

text.p: Land Bank of the Philippines has set a US$200 million floating rate certificate of deposit issue due 2002, said lead manager ING Barings.
The issue was launched at par and has a fixed re-offer of 99.85 percent. It pays a margin of 75 basis points over the three-month London Interbank Offered Rate.
BORROWER LAND BANK OF THE PHILIPPINES
AMOUNT US$200 MLN COUPON 3ML+75 MATURITY 5 YRS
TYPE FRCD ISS PRICE PAR* LAUNCH 21.FEB.97
PUTS NONE CALLS NONE REPLIES 12.MAR.97
LISTING -- REPAYMENT BULLET DENOMS US$100K
HOME CTRY PHILIPPINES GOV LAW ENGLISH PAY DATE --
NOTES *THERE IS A REDEMPTION OPTION IF THE REPUBLIC OF THE
PHILIPPINES HOLD LESS THAN A 51 PERCENT STAKE IN THE
BORROWER.
**THERE IS A FIXED RE-OFFER PRICE OF 99.85 PERCENT UNTIL
THE SYNDICATION IS CLOSED
MGT LEVELS AND FEES
CO-LEAD MANAGERS US$10 MLN+ 27.5 BP ALL-IN 80.5 BP
MANAGERS US$7MLN -US$9.9 MLN 20 BP ALL-IN 79 BP
CO-MANAGERS US$4 MLN - US$6.9 MLN 15 BP ALL-IN 78 BP
LEAD MANAGER ING BARINGS
CO-ARRANGERS BA ASIA, CHASE MANHATTAN ASIA, HSBC MARKETS,
AND DRESDNER SEA
-- Hong Kong Newsroom (852) 2847 4039
